meanings.definition: Resembling an arm in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The robot had long, armlike tentacles to grab objects.
meanings.sent2: The tree branches had an armlike appearance, reaching out in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The armlike branches of the tree seemed to wave at the passing birds.
meanings.sent4: The armlike shadows of the streetlights stretched across the sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: The armlike vines twisted around the fence, creating a natural barrier.
